Financial: Military retirement pay deduction from state income tax
Veterans preference in state employment (5 additional points)
Iowa Department of Veterans Affairs emergency financial assistance
Home Base Iowa employer incentive programs
Education: Iowa Veterans Trust Fund educational grants
Home Base Iowa military spouse career acceleration program
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill
Iowa National Guard Educational Assistance Program
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
State park annual passes for disabled veterans
Housing: Military Homeownership Assistance Program - down payment assistance
Disabled Veterans Property Tax Credit - up to ,852 annually
Iowa Finance Authority veteran home loan programs
Other: Stand Down events and homeless services
